ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Hate (was:RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe but PoF was the end all for high levels on E ci for the past two weeks. Except we ran into a slight problem and after the last patch Verant made the
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe but PoF was the end all for high levels on E'ci for the past two
weeks. Except we ran into a slight problem and after the last patch Verant
made the special items rare drops. So now while we had PoF cracked for two
weeks and room for people to join Lower Guk and Sol B also, Verant suddenly
changes it and ruins yet again something else for people. Why must they make
this game so time consuming?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, October 31, 1999 4:07 PM
Subject: Plane of Hate (was:RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate
weapon?)


>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>I would not count on the Plane of Hate being a cure-all for high-level zone
>overcrowding. As Brad said recently to a group on the Fear Plane that the
>Plane of Hate will make the Plane of Fear look like a newbie zone.
>
>Rokenn
>
>>From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
>>Date: Mon, 1 Nov 1999 14:24:24 -0500 (EST)
>>
>>
>>
>>On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Snicker Furfoot, Esq. wrote:
>>
>> > From the "official" source:
>> > "During last night's event, the Plane of Hate 'opened up a gate and
>>let
>> > forth it's minions'. It is not open as yet, however. This is just a
>> > preview of things to come."
>>
>>I am almost sure that the plane is open for two reasons. A GM mentioned
>>that the plane is open and the fact that Fennin Ro server has already
>>travelled to the zone. Hopefully I am right, as it is due time that they
>>gave the level 50s somethign to do so they can level us level 20-30 alone
>>in our dungeons =)
>>
>>Treilanin Loreweaver
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
